data.title: Flynn promised full cooperation to the Mueller team and is prepared to testify that candidate Trump "directed him to make contact with the Russians.
After 37 years, Voyager 1 has fired up its trajectory thrusters
Japan's ageing Emperor Akihito will step down in April 2019, marking the end of an imperial era for Japan.
A plan for zero tolerance of plastic pollution of the oceans may be agreed by nations at a UN environment summit.
Google is officially 100% sun and wind powered – 3.0 gigawatts worth: “Google’s energy infrastructure investments have totaled over $3.5 billion globally, with about two-thirds being in the US.”
Robert Mueller's Russia investigation reaches Trump's inner circle, putting Jared Kushner in spotlight
Paleontologists discover the mother lode — 215 miraculously well-preserved pterosaur eggs

Decades of unsustainable logging has created an “extinction debt” in Victoria’s central highlands that will trigger an ecosystem-wide collapse within 50 years without urgent intervention from the state government in Australia

A Turkish-Iranian gold trader on Thursday told jurors in a New York federal court that Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan personally authorized a transaction in a scheme to help Iran evade U.S. sanctions.
Sicilians take aim at oil 'monster' they blame for children's birth defects: Italy’s biggest oil firm is accused of polluting an area where experts found more toxic substance than water in the sea.
88 girls forced to undress before classmates as punishment for writing obscene words about teacher
Pakistan shooting: 'At least 13 dead' after Taliban disguised in burqas storm Peshawar university
European Parliament Passes A Motion to Impose Arms Embargo on Saudi Arabia over War Crimes in Yemen
Turkey's CHP reveals alleged documents showing Erdogan offshore money transfers
